Line1.1275AB: The dead rejoin the tribe in spirit and spear. Their blood reminds us of the worth of our own, and we will not stain their sacrifice.
Line3.1275AB: The cannibals believe strength is found in consuming the weak, but a single warrior shall never match the will of the many.
Line5.1275AB: Crane Tribe will meet them in their feeding ground and offer flesh for flesh.
Line7.1275AB: Let them gorge upon our spears.
